Important Articles.headline: T-Mobile US (TMUS), AT&T (T), and Verizon (VZ) are slugging it out in the 5G arena, each a telecom titan with a unique market offering for U.S. consumers. T-Mobile shares are favored due to strong medium-term financial guidance, with a 7% EBITDA and 8% free cash flow growth projected through 2027. Meanwhile, AT&T shared its shareholder return plans, which include $20 billion in dividends and $20 billion in share buybacks over the next three years. Verizon throws its hat into the ring with its ac
Important Articles.title: T‑Mobile, AT&T, and Verizon: The Leading 5G Stocks for Investor Portfolios

Important Articles.headline: Dividend stocks are a blessing to investors because they provide income and don't rely on stock price appreciation to reward shareholders.  You can't go wrong with dividend payouts at any time, but they're especially helpful when there's a lot of uncertainty in the stock market.  If you want investment income without worrying too much about stock price movements, the following two dividend stocks are worth adding to your stock portfolio.
Important Articles.title: The 2 Smartest Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now

Important Articles.headline: The market (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) outlook is uncertain, with a potentially rough earnings season ahead due to factors like tariffs, slower consumer spending, and business uncertainty. Chris Versace, Tematica Research chief investment officer, joins Catalysts host Madison Mills to share his insights on defensive stocks to buy amid market uncertainty. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.
Important Articles.title: Top defensive stock picks as tariffs, market uncertainty loom
